pr_title: Add Test for Single Listener to Multiple Tables in StreamingIT.

timeline.author: WenbinZhu

timeline.bodyText: Why sleeping here? Is the test relying on the sleep to be passed? If not we can remove it, otherwise it's better to make it synchronous instead of sleeping.
timeline.author: WenbinZhu

replies.bodyText: there is an async thread which delivers the updates every 50ms.  Changing it to be synchronous is a bigger change so keeping the sleep for now.
replies.author: pankti-m

timeline.bodyText: Maybe add a check for the content of the update?
timeline.author: WenbinZhu

timeline.message:
Add Test for Single Listener to Multiple Tables in StreamingIT.

We do not have a test where a single listener subscribes to multiple tables
and verifies that updates made to those tables in a single transaction are
received in the same CorfuStreamEntry.
